## User Story - Goal of the user
As a [ type of user ]
I want to [ execute some goal ]
So that [ reason ]   

## Acceptance Criteria - Actual steps taken by user to accomplish goal
Given that I [ specific action ]
When I [ perform said action ]
Then [ result of that action ]
